channel.title: Home on Harper Rocks
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Harper Rocks

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’ve been doing game development since late 2022, even though previously involved in programming and music composition. Here is some of my work! Game Jams I started participating in game jam in order to gain experience as a developer and mainly because I love working with other people. Here are some of the games I’ve developed during them: WALLFLOWER WALLFLOWER is a job simulator / visual novel where you play as the tired and quiet stationary cashier of a convenience store.

item.title: Links
item.description: I don’t use many social networks (in screentime and number of platforms), but here are some if you’re interested! If you wanna reach me out please EMAIL ME or DM on BlueSky. Websites This one My game studio (still WIP) Social Itch.io BlueSky Mastodon Stream my music! BandCamp YouTube Spotify Apple Music
